New Records: Rohit Sharma scored 87 runs for India in the match
Mohammed Shami took 4 wickets for 22 runs
India won the match by 100 runs
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah dismissed Mark Wood with a yorker

England's chase failed due to poor batting performance

Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the team's character
Jos Buttler expressed disappointment with the batting performance
